suggest.ext-apcu: Required to use the APC cache driver.
suggest.ext-filter: Required to use the DynamoDb cache driver.
suggest.ext-memcached: Required to use the memcache cache driver.
suggest.gsmanager-cloud/database: Required to use the database cache driver (^1).
suggest.gsmanager-cloud/filesystem: Required to use the file cache driver (^1).
suggest.gsmanager-cloud/redis: Required to use the redis cache driver (^1).
suggest.symfony/cache: Required to use PSR-6 cache bridge (^7.2).
